ToolTipWindow

public ToolTipWindow()
Creates a tool tip window with no specified owner.

ToolTipWindow

public ToolTipWindow(javax.swing.JFrame owner)
Creates a tool tip window. If owner is null, the shared owner will be used.

Parameters:
owner - the frame from which the window is displayed.
